channel.title: 562 help -changing yell-|-deleting command prompt-|-changing welcome message-
channel.description: ok, first of all, thank you to anyone reading this topic. i dearly appreciate any help. yell problem: ok, well in my server i am admin (owner). in having this rank, there are a few things i cant do. the major one that i care about is yelling. any1 thats mod and under can yell but me. see when i try to type a regular command with :: i get the message to type the apostraphee that opens a command prompt. when i try to do (example= yell hi!) it doesnt work. i want to make it so i can yell but i cant find the file. im guessing id have to delete the command prompt, but idk how/where the file is. welcome message: i want to change my welcome message, but idk what file thats in either. i rlly need the following directions to the command folder: where i wud change/add commands

item.title: 562 help -changing yell-|-deleting command prompt-|-changing welcome message-
item.dc:creator: @IpeekayI IpeekayI
item.description:
@IpeekayI wrote:

[quote=“jobocoy2, post:2, topic:334632”]it’s a bit of a stab in the dark, but commands for admin ranks generally dont apply for the standard game interface, you should open the admin command panel, (press the key located under the escape key [qwerty keyboards only]. just type the command without “::”

The commands folder should be located as follows…

src/com/rs2hd/packet handler/commandspackethandler.txt[/quote]
On azerty’s its the 6 above the T/Y atleast on my laptop.

Read full topic
item.source: 562 help -changing yell-|-deleting command prompt-|-changing welcome message-

item.title: 562 help -changing yell-|-deleting command prompt-|-changing welcome message-
item.dc:creator: @jobocoy2 jobocoy2
item.description:
@jobocoy2 wrote:

it’s a bit of a stab in the dark, but commands for admin ranks generally dont apply for the standard game interface, you should open the admin command panel, (press the key located under the escape key [qwerty keyboards only]. just type the command without “::”

The commands folder should be located as follows…

src/com/rs2hd/packet handler/commandspackethandler.txt

item.title: 562 help -changing yell-|-deleting command prompt-|-changing welcome message-
item.dc:creator: @blu3 blu3
item.description:
@blu3 wrote:

ok, first of all, thank you to anyone reading this topic. i dearly appreciate any help.
yell problem:
ok, well in my server i am admin (owner). in having this rank, there are a few things i cant do. the major one that i care about is yelling. any1 thats mod and under can yell but me. see when i try to type a regular command with :: i get the message to type the apostraphee that opens a command prompt. when i try to do (example= yell hi!) it doesnt work. i want to make it so i can yell but i cant find the file. im guessing id have to delete the command prompt, but idk how/where the file is.
welcome message:
i want to change my welcome message, but idk what file thats in either. i rlly need the following directions to the
command folder: where i wud change/add commands

Read full topic
